title: 20 min Beginner Flow for Strength & Flexibility
description:
Try this 20 minute beginner vinyasa flow sequence to build strength and increase overall flexibility!
❤️ Try my mobile app to get exclusive content! ❤️📱 👉 http://bit.ly/ytmobileapp
🛍️ SHOP MY MERCHANDISE, BOOKS & ONLINE COURSES 🧘👉 https://bit.ly/ywkshop

Hey yogis, this week I'm bringing you a simple but fun 20 minute beginner vinyasa flow yoga class for strength and flexibility. This is great for yogis just getting into their practice who want something slower paced that still hits all the marks.

We'll move in and out of poses slowly to build balance and foundational strength. You can expect a really good stretch in your hips and hamstrings as well. No props required!


✅ SUBSCRIBE TO SUPPORT FREE YOGA ON THE INTERNET  http://bit.ly/ywkassandra
🔔 Don’t forget to click on the bell to turn on post notifications!

Thanks for watching,
Kassandra

comments: Yoga always reminds me of how inflexible I am
Your classes are the ultimate - I love how you break everything down and make them available to everyone. Thankyou so much <3

You have quickly become my favourite yoga teacher on YT. As a beginner I appreciate how many different asanas you incorporate into even your shorter sequences, I feel like I learn more in your classes. Thanks for putting out free yoga sessions 💛

Since being introduced to your classes by a friend,  i have not missed a day! I started about a month ago and couldn't even lie flat on the ground in the first class but have come on in leaps and bounds and am much more flexible in my whole body.  My pulse rate has also reduced from 99 to down to 75 bpm. Gosh,  what results.  I can't thank you enough and tell everyone about your channel. You are an amazing teacher and a real inspiration. Fabulous work I am truly grateful to you . Namaste x
Started doing some of these everyday at 6am I’m trying to be an early bird and this really helps me wake up! Thank you
